mapper.select: select user.id, user.name, user.mobile, user.frozen, user.email, user.role_id, user.home_url from user_info user left join user_role role on user.role_id = role.id where user.name=#{name} and user.pwd=#{pwd}
select COUNT(DISTINCT user.id) from user_info user left join log_info log on user.id = log.author_id where user.role_id = 1

SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM ( SELECT temp.*, @rn := IF(@prev = temp.last_login_time,@rn + 1,1) AS rn, @prev = temp.last_login_time FROM (select user.id, user.name, user.mobile, user.frozen, user.email, user.home_url, log.last_login_time, log.ip_home_location,log.id AS logId from user_info user left join log_info log on user.id = log.author_id where user.role_id = 1 order by log.last_login_time DESC) as temp JOIN (SELECT @rn:= 0) AS vars ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 ORDER BY t.logId DESC) as tt GROUP BY tt.id ORDER BY tt.last_login_time DESC limit #{offset},#{row}
